#Libraries
```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```



#Data Import and Cleaning 
```{r}
week9_tbl <-as_tibble(read_csv("../data/week3.csv"))
#Adding means variables
for_shiny_tbl <- week9_tbl%>%
  mutate(timeStart=ymd_hms(timeStart),
         Q1Q5means =rowMeans(week9_tbl[5:9]),
         Q6Q10means=rowMeans(week9_tbl[10:14])) %>%
  filter(q6==1)

saveRDS(for_shiny_tbl, "../shiny/week9_shiny/for_shiny.rds")

```
